segments.text: I think we should buy some souvenirs to take home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why not ? What about us doing it right now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good idea . I noticed that on our way to the tower there are so many shops selling all kinds of souvenirs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So let's head there . We'd better hurry up .
segments.speaker: S2
